languages.text: "Ха... ха-ха-ха-ха!.." {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл стоит посреди утихшей битвы, с ног до головы покрытый кровью врагов. Радостная улыбка на его лице все больше кривится в оскал, а затуманенный взгляд излучает пугающий холод.{/n} "Ксеноублюдки барахтались до самого конца, вот это я понимаю охота! Жаль только... пестрого упустил. Хотел бы я расколоть его рогатую маску вместе с черепушкой".

traits.locale_text: "Ха... ха-ха-ха-ха!.." {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл стоит посреди утихшей битвы, с ног до головы покрытый кровью врагов. Радостная улыбка на его лице все больше кривится в оскал, а затуманенный взгляд излучает пугающий холод.{/n} "Видал{mf||а}, как Солитер испустил свой последний вздох? Вот это добыча — барахтался до самого конца! Вот это я понимаю охота!"

languages.text: "Ha... ha ha ha ha ha!" {n}Calligos Winterscale is standing in the heart of an abated battle, covered head to toe in the blood of his enemies. His excited smile gradually twists into a grin, and his glazed eyes emanate an alarming coldness.{/n} "The xenoscum struggled to the very end — now that's what I call a hunt! It's a shame I missed the garishly dressed one. I wish I could have cracked his horned mask along with his skull."
languages.original_text: "Ха... ха-ха-ха-ха!.." {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл стоит посреди утихшей битвы, с ног до головы покрытый кровью врагов. Радостная улыбка на его лице все больше кривится в оскал, а затуманенный взгляд излучает пугающий холод.{/n} "Ксеноублюдки барахтались до самого конца, вот это я понимаю охота! Жаль только... пестрого упустил. Хотел бы я расколоть его рогатую маску вместе с черепушкой".

His excited smile gradually twists into a grin, and his glazed eyes emanate an alarming coldness.{/n} "The xenoscum struggled to the very end — now that's what I call a hunt! It's a shame I missed the garishly dressed one. I wish I could have cracked his horned mask along with his skull."

"Ha... Hahahahaha!.." {n}Calligos Winterscale is standing in the heart of an abated battle, covered head to toe in the blood of his enemies. His excited smile gradually twists into a grin, and his glazed eyes emanate an alarming coldness.{/n} "Did you see how the Solitaire drew his last breath? Wallowed till his last breath — what a prey! Now that's what I call a hunt!"

It's a shame I missed the garishly dressed one. I wish I could have cracked his horned mask along with his skull."

Now that's what I call a hunt!"

His excited smile gradually twists into a grin, and his glazed eyes emanate an alarming coldness.{/n} "Did you see the Solitaire drew his last breath? Struggled to the very end — what a quarry! Now that's what I call a hunt!"

It's a shame I missed the garishly dressed one. I wish I could have cracked his horned mask along with his skull."

languages.text: «Ja... ¡ja, ja, ja, ja, ja!». {n}Calligos Winterscale se encuentra en el corazón de una batalla ya en calma, cubierto de pies a cabeza con la sangre de sus enemigos. Su sonrisa de entusiasmo se transforma gradualmente en una mueca, y sus ojos vidriosos transmiten una frialdad alarmante.{/n} «La escoria xenos se ha resistido hasta el final, ¡como debe ser en una cacería! Es una lástima que se escapara el de la ropa estrafalaria. Ojalá pudiera haberle partido esa máscara cornuda junto con su cráneo».
languages.original_text: "Ha... ha ha ha ha ha!" {n}Calligos Winterscale is standing in the heart of an abated battle, covered head to toe in the blood of his enemies. His excited smile gradually twists into a grin, and his glazed eyes emanate an alarming coldness.{/n} "The xenoscum struggled to the very end — now that's what I call a hunt! It's a shame I missed the garishly dressed one. I wish I could have cracked his horned mask along with his skull."

traits.locale_text: «Ja... ¡ja, ja, ja, ja, ja!». {n}Calligos Winterscale se encuentra en el corazón de una batalla ya en calma, cubierto de pies a cabeza con la sangre de sus enemigos. Su sonrisa de entusiasmo se transforma gradualmente en una mueca, y sus ojos vidriosos transmiten una frialdad alarmante.{/n} «La escoria xenos se ha resistido hasta el final, ¡como debe ser en una cacería! Es una lástima que se escapara el de la ropa estrafalaria. Ojalá pudiera haberle partido esa máscara cornuda junto con su cráneo».

languages.text: “哈……哈哈哈哈哈!”{n}卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔站在战场的残骸之中，从头到脚都沾满了敌人的鲜血。他兴奋的笑容逐渐变成了微弱的笑意，呆滞的目光中流露着令人不安的冷漠。{/n}“这头异形畜生挣扎到了最后一刻，狩猎就该是这个样子才对！真遗憾，我没能弄死那个花里胡哨的家伙，要是能把它的带角面具连头骨一起砸碎就好了。”
languages.original_text: "Ha... ha ha ha ha ha!" {n}Calligos Winterscale is standing in the heart of an abated battle, covered head to toe in the blood of his enemies. His excited smile gradually twists into a grin, and his glazed eyes emanate an alarming coldness.{/n} "The xenoscum struggled to the very end — now that's what I call a hunt! It's a shame I missed the garishly dressed one. I wish I could have cracked his horned mask along with his skull."

traits.locale_text: “哈……哈哈哈哈哈!”{n}卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔站在战场的残骸之中，从头到脚都沾满了敌人的鲜血。他兴奋的笑容逐渐变成了微弱的笑意，呆滞的目光中流露着令人不安的冷漠。{/n}“这头异形畜生挣扎到了最后一刻，狩猎就该是这个样子才对！真遗憾，我没能弄死那个花里胡哨的家伙，要是能把它的带角面具连头骨一起砸碎就好了。”

languages.text: « Ha... Ha ha ha ha ha ! » {n}Au milieu du champ de bataille où le calme commence à revenir, Calligos Winterscale est couvert de sang ennemi de la tête aux pieds. Son sourire extasié se tord peu à peu en rictus et un froid inquiétant émane de ses yeux vitreux.{/n} « Ces vermines xénos ont tenté de résister jusqu'à leur dernier souffle. Ça, c'est ce que j'appelle une belle chasse ! Je regrette seulement de ne pas avoir réussi à abattre celui à la tenue tape-à-l'œil. J'aurais adoré briser son masque à cornes en même temps que son crâne. »
languages.original_text: "Ha... ha ha ha ha ha!" {n}Calligos Winterscale is standing in the heart of an abated battle, covered head to toe in the blood of his enemies. His excited smile gradually twists into a grin, and his glazed eyes emanate an alarming coldness.{/n} "The xenoscum struggled to the very end — now that's what I call a hunt! It's a shame I missed the garishly dressed one. I wish I could have cracked his horned mask along with his skull."

traits.locale_text: « Ha... Ha ha ha ha ha ! » {n}Au milieu du champ de bataille où le calme commence à revenir, Calligos Winterscale est couvert de sang ennemi de la tête aux pieds. Son sourire extasié se tord peu à peu en rictus et un froid inquiétant émane de ses yeux vitreux.{/n} « Ces vermines xénos ont tenté de résister jusqu'à leur dernier souffle. Ça, c'est ce que j'appelle une belle chasse ! Je regrette seulement de ne pas avoir réussi à abattre celui à la tenue tape-à-l'œil. J'aurais adoré briser son masque à cornes en même temps que son crâne. »

languages.text: 「ハ…ハハハハハ！」{n}カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは、頭のてっぺんからつま先まで敵の血で濡れて、鎮まった戦闘の真ん中に立っていた。その興奮した微笑みは徐々にニタニタと形を変え、生気のない瞳は不安になるほど冷たく光る。{/n}「異種族の阿呆は最後の最後まで足掻いていた…これこそ狩りだよ！派手な見た目のアレを逃したのは悔やまれるな。角の仮面もろとも頭蓋骨を割ってやりたかったんだが」
languages.original_text: "Ha... ha ha ha ha ha!" {n}Calligos Winterscale is standing in the heart of an abated battle, covered head to toe in the blood of his enemies. His excited smile gradually twists into a grin, and his glazed eyes emanate an alarming coldness.{/n} "The xenoscum struggled to the very end — now that's what I call a hunt! It's a shame I missed the garishly dressed one. I wish I could have cracked his horned mask along with his skull."

traits.locale_text: 「ハ…ハハハハハ！」{n}カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは、頭のてっぺんからつま先まで敵の血で濡れて、鎮まった戦闘の真ん中に立っていた。その興奮した微笑みは徐々にニタニタと形を変え、生気のない瞳は不安になるほど冷たく光る。{/n}「異種族の阿呆は最後の最後まで足掻いていた…これこそ狩りだよ！派手な見た目のアレを逃したのは悔やまれるな。角の仮面もろとも頭蓋骨を割ってやりたかったんだが」

languages.text: "Ha ... ha ha ha ha ha!" {n}Calligos Winterzunder steht im Zentrum einer vergangenen Schlacht, von Kopf bis Fuß mit dem Blut seiner Feinde bedeckt. Sein aufgeregtes Lächeln verwandelt sich langsam in ein Grinsen, und seine glasigen Augen strahlen eine beunruhigende Kälte aus.{/n} "Der Xenosabschaum hat sich bis zuletzt gewehrt ... das nenne ich eine Jagd! Ein Jammer, dass mir der protzig Gekleidete entwischt ist. Ich wünschte, ich hätte ihm seine gehörnte Maske und seinen Schädel einschlagen können."
languages.original_text: "Ha... ha ha ha ha ha!" {n}Calligos Winterscale is standing in the heart of an abated battle, covered head to toe in the blood of his enemies. His excited smile gradually twists into a grin, and his glazed eyes emanate an alarming coldness.{/n} "The xenoscum struggled to the very end — now that's what I call a hunt! It's a shame I missed the garishly dressed one. I wish I could have cracked his horned mask along with his skull."

traits.locale_text: "Ha ... ha ha ha ha ha!" {n}Calligos Winterzunder steht im Herzen einer abgeklungenen Schlacht, von Kopf bis Fuß mit dem Blut seiner Feinde bedeckt. Sein aufgeregtes Lächeln verwandelt sich langsam in ein Grinsen, und seine glasigen Augen strahlen eine beunruhigende Kälte aus.{/n} "Der Xenosabschaum hat sich bis zuletzt gewehrt ... das nenne ich eine Jagd! Ein Jammer, dass mir der protzig Gekleidete entwischt ist. Ich wünschte, ich hätte ihm seine gehörnte Maske und seinen Schädel einschlagen können."

languages.text: "Ha... Ha ha ha ha ha!" {n}Calligos Winterscale; tepeden tırnağa düşmanlarının kanına bulanmış bir hâlde, dinen bir çatışmanın tam merkezinde duruyor. Heyecanını belli eden gülümsemesi, yavaş yavaş pis bir sırıtışa dönüşüyor. Donuk gözleriyse endişe veren bir soğukluk yayıyor.{/n} "Zeno pislikleri, son saniyeye kadar mücadele ettiler. İşte buna av derim ben! Şu cafcaflı giyineni kaçırmam kötü oldu. Keşke kafatasıyla birlikte o boynuzlu maskesini de çatlatsaydım."
languages.original_text: "Ha... ha ha ha ha ha!" {n}Calligos Winterscale is standing in the heart of an abated battle, covered head to toe in the blood of his enemies. His excited smile gradually twists into a grin, and his glazed eyes emanate an alarming coldness.{/n} "The xenoscum struggled to the very end — now that's what I call a hunt! It's a shame I missed the garishly dressed one. I wish I could have cracked his horned mask along with his skull."
